nealrichardson commented on PR #13313:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13313#issuecomment-1177682063

   Seems ok to me, did you confirm that this solves the problem (i.e. we don't have any CI that has `CDPATH` set)?

assignUser commented on PR #13313:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13313#issuecomment-1177708449

   I tested it locally+the crossbow jobs above and we don't set `CDPATH` anywhere.

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
at line 179 in the _configure_ file inside the R package _arrow_7.0.0.tar.gx_

_BUNDLED_LIBS=`cd $LIB_DIR && ls *.a`_

if _CDPATH_ is not null (in the env) _BUNDLED_DIR_ will contain also the _$LIB_DIR_ folder path, and the installation will fail during _ld_

_.../ld.gold: fatal error: .../arrow/libarrow/arrow-7.0.0/lib: pread failed: Is a directory_

 

a better option wuold be something like:

cd $LIB_DIR

BUNDLED_LIBS=`ls *.a`

 

ver. 8.0.0 is affected the same way

 

have a good day
fields.summary: [R] configure fails if CDPATH is not null
